trans-unit.source: Area is the file on the data/ folder with your DTM in GeoTiff format.
trans-unit.target: 区域是DTM格式的DTM在 data/ 文件夹中的文件。

trans-unit.source: X is the longitude in your reference dtm distance units.
Y is the latitude in your reference dtm distance units.
base_flow is the base income flow after the initial pic.
trans-unit.target: base_flow是初始图片之后的基本收入流。

trans-unit.source: break_flow is the start income flow.
break_time is the time that has to pass in seconds to go from the break_flow to the base_flow.
trans-unit.target: break_time是从break_flow到base_flow必须经过的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: cellsize is the size of your DTM cellsize.
radius is the maximum extension of the output flood in your dtm distance units.
trans-unit.target: radius是您的dtm距离单位中输出洪水的最大延伸量。

trans-unit.source: A python script to model hidrologic behavior of downstream drainpaths. With a DTM cover of your study area you can define longitude and latitude (in the DTM distance unit) as a start point and an income flow to see how the water will flood the territory.
trans-unit.target: 一个python脚本来模拟下游排水路径的水文行为。通过DTM覆盖您的研究区域,您可以定义经度和纬度(以DTM距离为单位)作为起始点和收入流,以了解水将如何淹没该地区。

trans-unit.source: A python script to modelate hidrologic behavior of downstream drainpaths
trans-unit.target: 用python脚本模拟下游排水路径的潮汐行为。

trans-unit.source: Arguments:
Dependencies
Execute test.py from inside the folder to test the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 从文件夹里面执行test.py来测试算法。

trans-unit.source: From source python setup.py install
Include mfdfloods as a module on your scripts with from mfd import MFD then instantiate the class MFD to execute its drainpaths method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 from mfd import MFD 脚本将mfdfloods作为模块包含在内，然后实例化MFD类以执行其排水路径方法。

trans-unit.source: Installation
MFD Floods
Test
The output will be placed in your data/ floder as three files with the name drainpaths_{x}-{y}_(draft|flood|speed).tif.
trans-unit.target: 输出将作为三个文件放置在您的 data/ 文件库中，名称为排水路径_ {x}-{y} _（草稿|洪水|速度）.tif。

trans-unit.source: The script requires GDAL installed on your system and python-gdal as a python dependency.
trans-unit.target: 脚本需要在你的系统上安装GDAL,并将python-gdal作为python的依赖。

trans-unit.source: The test.py is a script that call the class MFD and execute its modelization with the datasource from the data/ folder. There you have to place your GeoJSON files with the modelized line geometry.
trans-unit.target: test.py是一个脚本，它调用类MFD并使用来自 data/ 文件夹的数据源执行其建模。在那里，您必须将GeoJSON文件与模型化的线几何放置在一起。

trans-unit.source: To install GDAL execute apt install gdal-bin libgdal-dev.
trans-unit.target: 要安装GDAL，请执行 apt install gdal-bin libgdal-dev 。

trans-unit.source: To install python-gdal execute pip install "GDAL==$(osgeo-config --version)".
Use
With pip pip install mfdfloods
